TopicTitle: can ksp played on intel HD 5500 graphics card with windows 10 installed on computer

Articles.Content: Can I play KSP on a intel HD 5500 graphics card ? what will be the maximum graphics settings to play so ?

2 hours ago, binuboom K said:

Can I play KSP on a intel HD 5500 graphics card ?

Yes, with caveats.

Quote

what will be the maximum graphics settings to play so ?

You can likely play it on fairly high settings so long as you're nowhere near a planet; the terrain shader that KSP uses doesn't work well with integrated cards. This means you'll probably experience slowdowns and lag when flying in atmosphere or launching. Also, the GPU shares memory with the rest of the system so make sure you have a good amount of RAM.

Edited December 27, 2017 by regex

As someone who uses an Intel HD graphics card, I can tell you that the game runs well enough. Your CPU and RAM specs are much more important for KSP to run smoothly. 

Of course, this changes if you try to add graphics mods such as scatterer and such. These mods are much more GPU intensive.
